data.quote: All we can do is live until the day we die. Control what we can...and fly free!
data.author: Deneil Young

data.quote: Fear is not evil. It tells you what weakness is. And once you know your weakness, you can become stronger as well as kinder.
data.author: Gildarts Clive

data.quote: Whatever you lose, you'll find it again. But what you throw away you'll never get back.
data.author: Kenshin Himura

data.quote: The world is not beautiful, and that is why it is beautiful.
data.author: Kino

data.quote: There are no miracles in this world. There is only coincidence and necessity, and what people make of it.
data.author: Yuu Himura

data.quote: There is no such thing as a coincidence in this world. There is only the inevitable.
data.author: Yuuko Ichihara

data.quote: If you don’t like your destiny, don’t accept it. Instead, have the courage to change it the way you want it to be!
data.author: Uzumaki Naruto

data.quote: I hate perfection. To be perfect is to be unable to improve any further.
data.author: Kurotsuchi Mayuri

data.quote: We have to live a life of no regrets.
data.author: Portgas D. Ace

data.quote: If you don’t take risks, you can’t create a future.
data.author: Monkey D. Luffy
